name: Dead Flamingo
storyline: The story is mainly set in the ocean, sailing in water, exploring islands, and discovering environmental puzzles. In Dead Flamingo, your main objective is to find a way to break the cycle that sees the world, and everything in it, come to an abrupt and violent end every Sunday night. To do this you must uncover the secrets of this world, build relationships with the characters scattered above and below the ocean, and fight disturbing, Lovecraftian monsters.
summary: Dead Flamingo is an action-adventure fantasy game that follows the epic story of a young fisherman driven by hopeful ideals in an insidious world that meets its end every seven days.
